results.title: Comparison of Metformin and Simvastatin Administration in Women With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome Before Intra-Cytoplasmic Sperm Injection Cycle: A Prospective, Randomized, Clinical Trial Study
results.text_hl: In general, all of these drugs have positive effects in improving @<m>DISEASE_Hyperandrogenism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017588 @@@hyperandrogenic symptoms@@@ and regulation of menstrual cycles, but @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ have been more commonly used than others for treatment and research purposes.

citations.NLM: Pourmatroud E, Mohammadjafari R, Roozitalab M. Comparison of Metformin and Simvastatin Administration in Women With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome Before Intra-Cytoplasmic Sperm Injection Cycle: A Prospective, Randomized, Clinical Trial Study Iran Red Crescent Med J. 2015 Dec;17(12):e20082. PMID: 26756007
